original_title: 宇宙刑事ギャバン VS 特捜戦隊デカレンジャー
overview: Space Sheriff Gavan vs Tokusou Sentai Dekaranger features the return of Yuma Ishigaki from 2012’s Space Sheriff Gavan: The Movie and the 2015 Space Sheriff Next Generation films. The first installment will join the two police themed heroes as they face a massive space crime organization.
title: Space Squad: Space Sheriff Gavan vs. Tokusou Sentai Dekaranger
